objective.D: D - Applying Mathematics in Real-Life Contexts

strand.A-i: Select appropriate mathematics when solving problems in both familiar and unfamiliar situations
strand.A-ii: Apply the selected mathematics successfully when solving problems
strand.A-iii: Solve problems correctly in a variety of contexts
strand.B-i: Select and apply mathematical problem-solving techniques to discover complex patterns
strand.B-ii: Describe patterns as general rules consistent with findings
strand.B-iii: Prove, or verify and justify, general rules
strand.C-i: Use appropriate mathematical language (notation, symbols and terminology) in both oral and written explanations
strand.C-ii: Use appropriate forms of mathematical representation to present information
strand.C-iii: Move between different forms of mathematical representation
strand.C-iv: Communicate complete, coherent and concise mathematical lines of reasoning
strand.C-v: Organize information using a logical structure
strand.D-i: Identify relevant elements of authentic real-life situations
strand.D-ii: Select appropriate mathematical strategies when solving authentic real-life situations
strand.D-iii: Apply the selected mathematical strategies successfully to reach a solution
strand.D-iv: Justify the degree of accuracy of a solution
strand.D-v: Justify whether a solution makes sense in the context of the authentic real-life situation
